ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of MIKE PEDERSEN of Toronto, Ontario, as Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, effective March 5, 2022.
